title: Noah “40” Shebib On Drake: “He's The Best To Ever Do This”
content:
“There's no one else,” the producer said via Twitter. 

Noah “40” Shebib, Drake’s long-time producer and co-founder of OVO Sound, took to Twitter yesterday (September 19) to praise Drake for his artistic merit.

“He's the best to ever do this,” 40’s tweet reads. “I'll always stand by that. I've seen too much, I know too much about how this all works. There's no one else.”

40’s tweet comes just 24 hours before the scheduled release date of Drake’s What A Time To Be Alive project with Future.

Drizzy took to Instagram yesterday to share what appears to be the project’s cover art. He wrote the following message in the post’s caption field: “WHAT A TIME TO BE ALIVE available at 8pm EST, Sunday on ITunes @future @applemusic”

Noah “40” Shebib’s tweet is as follows:

He's the best to ever do this. I'll always stand by that. I've seen too much, I know too much about how this all works. There's no one else.

— Noah Shebib (@OVO40) September 19, 2015
